md:
giải nghĩa từ "immerse" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Immerse (verb) - Đắm mình, ngâm mình, chìm trong

+ Meaning: to dip or put something into a liquid or to involve someone or something completely in an activity or feeling.

+ Example: She immersed herself in the novel and forgot about everything else.

+ Related words: dip, plunge, soak, engross, absorb

+ Antonyms: emerge, withdraw, detach

* Immerse (adjective) - Đắm mình, ngâm mình, chìm trong

+ Meaning: completely involved or absorbed in something.

+ Example: He was immersed in his work and didn't notice the time.

+ Related words: absorbed, engrossed, enthralled, captivated, fascinated

+ Antonyms: detached, uninterested, distracted

Note: The verb "immerse" can also mean to baptize someone by dipping them into water, but this meaning is less common in everyday language.
